00010 
00011   void DaqTypeDataBlock::setIntArrays(const DaqTypeDataIntMap_t& daqTypeDataIntMap) {
00012     //if the buffer is empty we make a simple copy
00013     if(_bufferOfInts.size()==0) {
00014       _bufferOfInts=daqTypeDataIntMap;
00015       //if there is already something in the buffer we append the new elements
00016     } else {
00017       for(DaqTypeDataIntMap_t::const_iterator theiter = daqTypeDataIntMap.begin(); theiter != daqTypeDataIntMap.end(); theiter++) {
00018         if(!_bufferOfInts.insert(std::pair<std::string, std::vector<int> >(theiter->first,theiter->second)).second) std::cout << "Problems with inserting element " <<  theiter->first << " into buffer" << std::endl; 
00019       }
00020     }    
00021 
00022   }
00023 
00024 
00025   void DaqTypeDataBlock::setIntArrays(const DaqTypeDataUIntMap_t& daqTypeDataUIntMap) {
00026     //fill the unsigned ints into the int arrays, the LCGenericObject offers no other possibility
00027       for(DaqTypeDataUIntMap_t::const_iterator theiter = daqTypeDataUIntMap.begin(); theiter != daqTypeDataUIntMap.end(); theiter++) {
00028         //can this be done more elegantly?
00029         std::vector<int> v;
00030         for(std::vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator veciter=theiter->second.begin(); veciter != theiter->second.end(); veciter++) v.push_back(static_cast<int>((*veciter)));
00031         if(!_bufferOfInts.insert (std::pair<std::string, std::vector<int> >(theiter->first, v)).second) std::cout << "Problems with inserting element " <<  theiter->first << " into buffer" << std::endl; 
00032       }
00033     
00034   }
00035 
00036 
00037   DaqTypeDataBlock*  DaqTypeDataBlock::finalize(){ 
00038 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00039     std::cout << "Finalizing the object" << std::endl;
00040 #endif    
00041     //Store the ints in the object
00042     //We will start with the time stamp as these are not ordinary beamline readings
00043     //and might need to be accessed seperately from the former 
00044     setNumberOfTimeStamps(static_cast<int>(_timeStampMapRaw.size()));
00045 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00046     std::cout << "number of time stamps: " << getNumberOfTimeStamps() << std::endl;
00047 #endif
00048     //Pointer to the first start indexpointer for the names of the time stamps 
00049     unsigned int namestartindexpointer(kIntDaqTypeDataStart);
00050     setPointerToIndexOfTimeStampNames(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer));
00051     //Where do we store the length of the names?
00052     unsigned int namelength_memo(getPointerToIndexOfTimeStampNames()+getNumberOfTimeStamps());
00053     setLengthIndexOfTimeStampNames(static_cast<int>(namelength_memo));
00054     //Where do the decomposed names of the int data types start?
00055     unsigned int namestartpointer(getPointerToIndexOfTimeStampNames()+2*getNumberOfTimeStamps());
00056     //now loop over the time stamps
00057     //Initialise the valuepointer to be the namestartpointer
00058     unsigned int valuepointer(namestartpointer);
00059     for(std::map<std::string, time_t>::iterator timestamp_iter=_timeStampMapRaw.begin(); timestamp_iter != _timeStampMapRaw.end(); timestamp_iter++){
00060       //The nextindex is the place where we can e.g. the next entry into the generic object
00061 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00062       std::cout << "Timestamp type is: " << (*timestamp_iter).first << std::endl;
00063       std::cout << "Timestamps - Value Pointer is: " << valuepointer << std::endl;
00064       std::cout << "Timestamps - Namelength memo before: " <<  namelength_memo << std::endl;  
00065 #endif
00066       namestartpointer = convertStringToInts(obj(),(*timestamp_iter).first, valuepointer, namelength_memo);
00067 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG      
00068       std::cout << "The name of the Timestamp is: " << getStringFromInts(obj(), valuepointer, namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00069       std::cout << "Timestamp from data: " << &(timestamp_iter->second) << "= "<< gmtime(&(timestamp_iter->second)) << std::endl;
00070       std::cout << "Timezone: " << gmtime( &(timestamp_iter->second))->tm_zone << std::endl;
00071 #endif
00072       setTypeIndex(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer), static_cast<int>(valuepointer));
00073 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00074       std::cout << "Start of Name of Timestamp is memorized at: " << namestartindexpointer << std::endl; 
00075       std::cout << "Length of Name of Timestamp is memorized at: "  << namelength_memo << std::endl; 
00076       std::cout << "Length of Name of Timestamp is: "  << obj()->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00077 #endif
00078       namestartindexpointer++;
00079       namelength_memo++;
00080       valuepointer=namestartpointer;
00081       //Convert the time_t timestamp into two ints which we will store
00082       calculateTimeStamp(gmtime( &(timestamp_iter->second) ));
00083       for(unsigned itime=0; itime<2; itime++){
00084 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00085         std::cout << "Timestamp Valuepointer " << itime << "  is: " << valuepointer << std::endl;
00086         std::cout << "Timestamp[" << itime << "]=" << _timestamptoint[itime] << std::endl;
00087 #endif
00088         obj()->setIntVal(valuepointer, _timestamptoint[itime]);
00089         valuepointer++;
00090       }
00091       
00092    }
00093 
00094 
00095     //Number of int data types
00096     setNumberOfIntTypes(static_cast<int>(_bufferOfInts.size()));
00097 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00098     std::cout << "num of datatypes: " << getNumberOfIntTypes() << std::endl;
00099 #endif
00100     //Pointer to the first startindex pointer for the names of the data type
00101     namestartindexpointer=valuepointer;
00102     setPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer));
00103     //Where to we store the length of the names?
00104     namelength_memo=getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames()+getNumberOfIntTypes();
00105     setLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames(static_cast<int>(namelength_memo));
00106     //Where to we store the sizes of the data types
00107     unsigned int size_memo(getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames()+2*getNumberOfIntTypes());
00108     setSizeIndexOfIntType(static_cast<int>(size_memo));
00109     //Where do the decomposed names of the int data types start?
00110     namestartpointer=getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames()+3*getNumberOfIntTypes();
00111     setTypeIndex(getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames(),  namestartpointer);
00112     //For each int data type we store the sequence Name, Values. Therefore the first entry in each block is a part of the name string
00113     //in particular the one which follows the last value
00114     //Initialise the valuepointer to be the namestartpointer
00115     valuepointer=namestartpointer;
00116     for ( DaqTypeDataIntMap_t::iterator slowmap_iter = _bufferOfInts.begin(); slowmap_iter != _bufferOfInts.end(); slowmap_iter++) {
00117       //The nextindex is the place where we can e.g. the next entry into the generic object
00118 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00119       std::cout << "Data type is: " << (*slowmap_iter).first << std::endl;
00120       std::cout << "Value Pointer is: " << valuepointer << std::endl;
00121       std::cout << "Namelength memo before: :" <<  namelength_memo << std::endl;  
00122 #endif
00123       namestartpointer = convertStringToInts(obj(),(*slowmap_iter).first, valuepointer, namelength_memo);
00124 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00125       std::cout << "The name is: " << getStringFromInts(obj(), valuepointer, namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00126 #endif
00127       setTypeIndex(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer), static_cast<int>(valuepointer));
00128 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00129       std::cout << "Start of Name is memorized at: " << namestartindexpointer << std::endl; 
00130       std::cout << "Length of Name is memorized at: "  << namelength_memo << std::endl; 
00131       std::cout << "Length of Name is: "  << obj()->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00132 #endif
00133       namestartindexpointer++;
00134       namelength_memo++;
00135       //memorize the size of the datatype
00136       setTypeIndex(static_cast<int>(size_memo), static_cast<int>((*slowmap_iter).second.size()));
00137       size_memo++;
00138       valuepointer=namestartpointer;
00139       for(std::vector<int>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00140             (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ ){
00141 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00142         std::cout << "Valuepointer is: " << valuepointer << std::endl;
00143         std::cout << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00144 #endif
00145         obj()->setIntVal(valuepointer, (*thevals_iter));
00146         valuepointer++;
00147       }  
00148 
00149 
00150     }
00151     
00152 
00153     //store the doubles in the object
00154     //Number of double data types
00155     setNumberOfDblTypes(static_cast<int>(_bufferOfDbls.size()));
00156 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00157     std::cout << "num of datatypes: " << getNumberOfDblTypes() << std::endl;
00158 #endif
00159     //Pointer to the first startindex pointer for the names of the data type
00160     namestartindexpointer=valuepointer;
00161     setPointerToIndexOfDblTypeNames(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer));
00162     //Where to we store the length of the names
00163     namelength_memo=getPointerToIndexOfDblTypeNames()+getNumberOfDblTypes();
00164     setLengthIndexOfDblTypeNames(static_cast<int>(namelength_memo));
00165     //Where to we store the sizes of the data types
00166     size_memo=getPointerToIndexOfDblTypeNames()+2*getNumberOfDblTypes();
00167     setSizeIndexOfDblType(static_cast<int>(size_memo));
00168     //Where do the decomposed names of the int data types start?
00169     namestartpointer=getPointerToIndexOfDblTypeNames()+3*getNumberOfDblTypes();
00170     obj()->setIntVal(getPointerToIndexOfDblTypeNames(), static_cast<int>(namestartpointer)); 
00171     unsigned int iposDbl(kIntDaqTypeDblReadings);
00172     for ( DaqTypeDataDblMap_t::iterator slowmap_iter = _bufferOfDbls.begin(); slowmap_iter != _bufferOfDbls.end(); slowmap_iter++) {
00173 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00174       std::cout << "Data type is: " << (*slowmap_iter).first << std::endl;
00175       std::cout << "Namestartpointer Pointer is: " << namestartpointer << std::endl;
00176 #endif
00177       unsigned int storepointer=namestartpointer;
00178       namestartpointer = convertStringToInts(obj(),(*slowmap_iter).first, namestartpointer, namelength_memo);
00179 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00180       std::cout << "The name is: " << getStringFromInts(obj(), storepointer, namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00181 #endif
00182       setTypeIndex(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer), static_cast<int>(storepointer));
00183 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00184       std::cout << "Start of Name is memorized at: " << namestartindexpointer << std::endl; 
00185       std::cout << "Length of Name is memorized at: "  << namelength_memo << std::endl; 
00186       std::cout << "Length of Name is: "  << obj()->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00187 #endif
00188       namestartindexpointer++;
00189       namelength_memo++;
00190       //memorize the size of the datatype
00191       //obj()->setIntVal(size_memo, static_cast<int>((*slowmap_iter).second.size()));
00192       setTypeIndex(static_cast<int>(size_memo), static_cast<int>((*slowmap_iter).second.size()));
00193       size_memo++;
00194       for(std::vector<double>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00195             (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ ){
00196 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00197         std::cout << "Valuepointer is: " << iposDbl << std::endl;
00198         std::cout << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00199 #endif
00200         obj()->setDoubleVal(iposDbl, (*thevals_iter));
00201         iposDbl++;
00202       }  
00203     }
00204     
00205 
00206     
00207     //Store the floats in the object
00208     //Number of int data types
00209     setNumberOfFloatTypes(static_cast<int>(_bufferOfFloats.size()));
00210 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00211     std::cout << "num of float datatypes: " << getNumberOfFloatTypes() << std::endl;
00212 #endif
00213     //Pointer to the first startindex pointer for the names of the data type
00214     namestartindexpointer=namestartpointer;
00215     setPointerToIndexOfFloatTypeNames(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer));
00216     //Where to we store the length of the names
00217     namelength_memo=getPointerToIndexOfFloatTypeNames()+getNumberOfFloatTypes();
00218     setLengthIndexOfFloatTypeNames(static_cast<int>(namelength_memo));
00219     //Where to we store the sizes of the data types
00220     size_memo=getLengthIndexOfFloatTypeNames()+2*getNumberOfFloatTypes();
00221     setSizeIndexOfFloatType(static_cast<int>(size_memo));
00222     //Where do the decomposed names of the int data types start?
00223     namestartpointer=getPointerToIndexOfFloatTypeNames()+3*getNumberOfFloatTypes();
00224     obj()->setIntVal(getPointerToIndexOfFloatTypeNames(), static_cast<int>(namestartpointer)); 
00225     
00226     unsigned int iposFloat(kIntDaqTypeFloatReadings);
00227     for ( DaqTypeDataFloatMap_t::iterator slowmap_iter = _bufferOfFloats.begin(); slowmap_iter != _bufferOfFloats.end(); slowmap_iter++) {
00228 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00229       std::cout << "Data type is: " << (*slowmap_iter).first << std::endl;
00230       std::cout << "Namestartpointer Pointer is: " << namestartpointer << std::endl;
00231 #endif
00232       unsigned int storepointer=namestartpointer;
00233       namestartpointer = convertStringToInts(obj(),(*slowmap_iter).first, storepointer, namelength_memo);
00234 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00235       std::cout << "The name is: " << getStringFromInts(obj(), storepointer, namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00236 #endif
00237       setTypeIndex(static_cast<int>(namestartindexpointer), static_cast<int>(namestartpointer));
00238 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00239       std::cout << "Start of Name is memorized at: " << namestartindexpointer << std::endl; 
00240       std::cout << "Length of Name is memorized at: "  << namelength_memo << std::endl; 
00241       std::cout << "Length of Name is: "  << obj()->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00242 #endif
00243       namestartindexpointer++;
00244       namelength_memo++;
00245       for(std::vector<float>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00246             (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ ){
00247 #ifdef CONV_DEBUG
00248         std::cout << "Valuepointer is: " << iposFloat << std::endl;
00249         std::cout << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00250 #endif
00251         obj()->setFloatVal(iposFloat, (*thevals_iter));
00252         iposFloat++;
00253       }  
00254     }
00255     
00256     _obj=obj(); 
00257     //Restore the maps immediately to have them ready for the print function below
00258     _timeStampMapRaw.clear();
00259     _timeStampMap.clear();
00260     _bufferOfDbls.clear();
00261     _bufferOfInts.clear();
00262     _bufferOfFloats.clear();   
00263     RestoreMaps();
00264     return this;
00265   }
00266 
00267   void DaqTypeDataBlock::RestoreMaps(){
00268 
00269 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00270     std::cout << "Restoring the maps " << std::endl;
00271 #endif
00272     //Restoring the maps containing the timestamps
00273     //get the number of int data data types
00274     unsigned int timestamps_int(getNumberOfTimeStamps());
00275 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00276     std::cout << "Number of Timestamps: " << timestamps_int << std::endl;
00277 #endif
00278     //loop over the number of datatypes and reconstruct the names and values
00279     unsigned int namestartpointer(getPointerToIndexOfTimeStampNames());
00280     unsigned int namelength_memo(getLengthIndexOfTimeStampNames());
00281     for( unsigned int itime=0; itime<timestamps_int;itime++) {
00282 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00283       std::cout << "Timestamp - NamestartPointer memo: " << namestartpointer << std::endl;
00284       std::cout << "Timestamp - NamestartPointer: " << _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer) << std::endl;
00285       std::cout << "Timestamp Nameslength memo pointer: " << namelength_memo << std::endl;
00286       std::cout << "Timestamp Namelength: " <<  _obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00287       std::cout << "Timestamp Restored name: " << getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00288       std::cout << "********************************************" << std::endl;
00289 #endif
00290       //Refilling the map
00291       //where to the actual readings start
00292       //The complicates expression below is caused by the fact that the integer values are stored with other information
00293       //like indexing and in particular the decomposed names of the data types. The latter can occupy either an odd or an even number in memory
00294       unsigned int posval=((_obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo)%sizeof(int))==0) ?  static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer)) + static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo)/sizeof(int) ) : static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer))+static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo)/sizeof(int) )+1;
00295 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00296       std::cout << "Timestamp Position Value is: " << posval << std::endl;
00297 #endif
00298       _timestamptoint[0]=obj()->getIntVal(posval);
00299       _timestamptoint[1]=obj()->getIntVal(++posval);
00300 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00301       std::cout << "Restored Time Stamp: " <<  composeTimeStamp().getDateString() << std::endl;
00302 #endif
00303       if(!_timeStampMap.insert( std::pair<string,LCTime > ( getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo), composeTimeStamp() )  ).second) {std::cout << "Warning problems with filling LCTime Timestamp for Timestamp " << getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo) << std::endl; 
00304       std::cout << "Will fill 0" << std::endl;
00305       _timeStampMap.insert( std::pair<string, LCTime > ( getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo), 0)  );
00306       }
00307       //increment the positions for the pointer storage
00308       namestartpointer++;
00309       namelength_memo++;
00310     }
00311 
00312 
00313     //Restore the int maps
00314 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00315     std::cout << "Restoring the int maps" << std::endl;
00316 #endif
00317     //get the number of int data data types
00318     unsigned int datatypes_int(getNumberOfIntTypes());
00319 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00320     std::cout << "Number of Int data types: " << datatypes_int << std::endl;
00321 #endif
00322     //loop over the number of datatypes and reconstruct the names and values
00323     namestartpointer=getPointerToIndexOfIntTypeNames();
00324     namelength_memo=getLengthIndexOfIntTypeNames();
00325     unsigned int size_memo(getSizeIndexOfIntType());
00326     for( unsigned int itype=0; itype<datatypes_int;itype++) {
00327 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00328       std::cout << "NamestartPointer memo: " << namestartpointer << std::endl;
00329       std::cout << "NamestartPointer: " << _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer) << std::endl;
00330       std::cout << "Nameslength memo pointer: " << namelength_memo << std::endl;
00331       std::cout << "Namelength: " <<  _obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00332       std::cout << "Restored name: " << getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00333       std::cout << "********************************************" << std::endl;
00334 #endif
00335       //Refilling the map
00336     //where to the actual readings start
00337       unsigned int posval=((_obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo)%sizeof(int))==0) ?  static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer)) + static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo)/sizeof(int) ) : static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer))+static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo)/sizeof(int) )+1;
00338 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00339       std::cout << "Size is memorized at: " << size_memo << std::endl;
00340       std::cout << "Values for datatype: " << static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(size_memo)) << std::endl;
00341       std::cout << "Position Value is: " << posval << std::endl;
00342 #endif
00343       for(unsigned int ival=0; ival < static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(size_memo)); ival++) {
00344 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00345         std::cout << "Restored Value: " <<  _obj->getIntVal(posval) << std::endl;
00346 #endif
00347         _bufferOfInts.insert( std::pair<string,std::vector<int> > ( getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo), std::vector<int> () )  ).first->second.push_back( _obj->getIntVal(posval) );
00348         posval++;
00349       }
00350       //increment the positions for the pointer storage
00351       namestartpointer++;
00352       namelength_memo++;
00353       size_memo++;
00354     }
00355 
00356 
00357 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00358     std::cout << "Restoring the double maps" << std::endl;
00359 #endif
00360     _bufferOfDbls.clear();
00361 
00362     //get the number of int data data types
00363     unsigned int datatypes_dbl(getNumberOfDblTypes());
00364 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00365     std::cout << "Number of Dbl data types: " << datatypes_dbl << std::endl;
00366 #endif
00367     //loop over the number of datatypes and reconstruct the names and values
00368     namestartpointer=getPointerToIndexOfDblTypeNames();
00369     namelength_memo=getLengthIndexOfDblTypeNames();
00370     size_memo=getSizeIndexOfDblType();
00371     //where to the actual readings start
00372     unsigned int posval(kIntDaqTypeDblReadings);
00373     for( unsigned int itype=0; itype<datatypes_dbl;itype++) {
00374 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00375       std::cout << "NamestartPointer memo: " << namestartpointer << std::endl;
00376       std::cout << "NamestartPointer: " << _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer) << std::endl;
00377       std::cout << "Nameslength memo pointer: " << namelength_memo << std::endl;
00378       std::cout << "Namelength: " <<  _obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00379       std::cout << "Restored name: " << getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00380       std::cout << "********************************************" << std::endl;
00381       std::cout << "Size is memorized at: " << size_memo << std::endl;
00382       std::cout << "Values for datatype: " << static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(size_memo)) << std::endl;
00383       std::cout << "Position Value is: " << posval << std::endl;
00384 #endif      
00385       //Refilling the map
00386       for(unsigned int ival=0; ival < static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(size_memo)); ival++) {
00387 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00388         std::cout << "Restored Value: " <<  _obj->getDoubleVal(posval) << std::endl;
00389 #endif
00390         _bufferOfDbls.insert( std::pair<string,std::vector<double> > ( getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo), std::vector<double> () )  ).first->second.push_back( _obj->getDoubleVal(posval) );
00391         posval++;
00392       }
00393       //increment the positions for the pointer storage
00394       namestartpointer++;
00395       namelength_memo++;
00396       size_memo++;
00397     }
00398 
00399 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00400     std::cout << "Restoring the float maps" << std::endl;
00401 #endif
00402     //get the number of int data data types
00403     unsigned int datatypes_float(getNumberOfFloatTypes());
00404 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00405     std::cout << "Number of Float data types: " << datatypes_float << std::endl;
00406 #endif
00407     //loop over the number of datatypes and reconstruct the names and values
00408     namestartpointer=getPointerToIndexOfFloatTypeNames();
00409     namelength_memo=getLengthIndexOfFloatTypeNames();
00410     size_memo=getSizeIndexOfFloatType();
00411     //where to the actual readings start
00412     posval=kIntDaqTypeFloatReadings;
00413     for( unsigned int itype=0; itype<datatypes_float;itype++) {
00414 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00415       std::cout << "NamestartPointer memo: " << namestartpointer << std::endl;
00416       std::cout << "NamestartPointer: " << _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer) << std::endl;
00417       std::cout << "Nameslength memo pointer: " << namelength_memo << std::endl;
00418       std::cout << "Namelength: " <<  _obj->getIntVal(namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00419       std::cout << "Restored name: " << getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo) << std::endl;
00420       std::cout << "********************************************" << std::endl;
00421       std::cout << "Size is memorized at: " << size_memo << std::endl;
00422       std::cout << "Values for datatype: " << static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(size_memo)) << std::endl;
00423       std::cout << "Position Value is: " << posval << std::endl;
00424 #endif
00425       //Refilling the map
00426       for(unsigned int ival=0; ival < static_cast<unsigned int>(_obj->getIntVal(size_memo)); ival++) {
00427 #ifdef RECO_DEBUG
00428         std::cout << "Restored Value: " <<  _obj->getFloatVal(posval) << std::endl;
00429 #endif
00430         _bufferOfFloats.insert( std::pair<string,std::vector<float> > ( getStringFromInts(_obj, _obj->getIntVal(namestartpointer), namelength_memo), std::vector<float> () )  ).first->second.push_back( _obj->getFloatVal(posval) );
00431         posval++;
00432       }
00433       //increment the positions for the pointer storage
00434       namestartpointer++;
00435       namelength_memo++;
00436       size_memo++;
00437     }
00438   }
00439 
00440 
00441   void DaqTypeDataBlock::calculateTimeStamp(struct tm* timestamp){
00442     //Reset the array containing the timestamp variables
00443     _timestamptoint[0]=0;
00444     _timestamptoint[1]=0;
00445 
00446     if(timestamp) {
00447       //Timestamp year month day
00448       _timestamptoint[0] = _timestamptoint[0] | ( ( (timestamp->tm_year + TM_YEARSTART) & 0xffff) << YEARSHIFT) 
00449         | ( ( (timestamp->tm_mon + 1) & 0xff) << MONTHSHIFT)
00450         | ( (  timestamp->tm_mday & 0xff) << DAYSHIFT);  
00451       
00452       //Timestamp hour minute second
00453       
00454       _timestamptoint[1] = _timestamptoint[1] | ( (timestamp->tm_hour & 0xff) << HOURSHIFT)
00455         | ( (timestamp->tm_min  & 0xff) << MINUTESHIFT)
00456         | ( (timestamp->tm_sec  & 0xff) << SECONDSHIFT);  
00457     }
00458   }
00459 
00460   LCTime DaqTypeDataBlock::composeTimeStamp(){
00461 
00462     //composition of an intermediate LCTime object in order
00463     //to get everything up to seconds in nanosecs.
00464     LCTime init(  (_timestamptoint[0] >> YEARSHIFT) & 0xffff,
00465                   (_timestamptoint[0] >> MONTHSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00466                   (_timestamptoint[0] >> DAYSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00467                   (_timestamptoint[1] >> HOURSHIFT) & 0xff,     
00468                   (_timestamptoint[1] >> MINUTESHIFT) & 0xff,     
00469                   (_timestamptoint[1] >> SECONDSHIFT) & 0xff );
00470     LCTime finaltime(init.timeStamp());
00471     return finaltime;
00472   }

00474   // Convenient print method 
00475   void DaqTypeDataBlock::print(std::ostream& os) {
00476     //Check What we did, loop over the restored maps 
00477     os << "**************Inspecting the restored TimeStamp Maps********************" << std::endl;
00478     for(TimeStampMap_t::iterator timestamp_iter=_timeStampMap.begin(); timestamp_iter!=_timeStampMap.end(); timestamp_iter++) os << (*timestamp_iter).first << ": " << (*timestamp_iter).second.getDateString() << std::endl;
00479     os << "**************************** End *************************************" << std::endl;  
00480 
00481 
00482     os << "**************Inspecting the restored Int Maps********************" << std::endl;
00483     for ( DaqTypeDataIntMap_t::iterator slowmap_iter = _bufferOfInts.begin(); slowmap_iter != _bufferOfInts.end(); slowmap_iter++) {
00484       os << "Data type is: " << (*slowmap_iter).first << std::endl;
00485       for(std::vector<int>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00486             (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ )os << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00487     }
00488     os << "**************************** End *************************************" << std::endl;  
00489 
00490 
00491     os << "**************Inspecting the restored Double Maps********************" << std::endl;
00492     for ( DaqTypeDataDblMap_t::iterator slowmap_iter = _bufferOfDbls.begin(); slowmap_iter != _bufferOfDbls.end(); slowmap_iter++) {
00493       os << "Data type is: " << (*slowmap_iter).first << std::endl;
00494       for(std::vector<double>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00495             (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ )os << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00496     }
00497     os << "**************************** End *************************************" << std::endl;
00498 
00499     os << "**************Inspecting the restored Float Maps********************" << std::endl;
00500     for ( DaqTypeDataFloatMap_t::iterator slowmap_iter = _bufferOfFloats.begin(); slowmap_iter != _bufferOfFloats.end(); slowmap_iter++) {
00501       os << "Data type is: " << (*slowmap_iter).first << std::endl;
00502       for(std::vector<float>::const_iterator thevals_iter =
00503             (*slowmap_iter).second.begin(); thevals_iter != (*slowmap_iter).second.end(); thevals_iter++ )os << "Value: " << (*thevals_iter) << std::endl;
00504     }
00505     os << "**************************** End *************************************" << std::endl;
00506 
00507   }
